meanings.definition: Involving or representing two or more colleges.
meanings.sent1: The intercollegiate debate competition included students from different colleges.
meanings.sent2: The intercollegiate soccer match was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent3: The intercollegiate spelling bee had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: Her intercollegiate friendships spanned across various campuses.
meanings.sent5: The intercollegiate art exhibition showcased talent from multiple colleges.

meanings.definition: Relating to competition or activities between colleges.
meanings.sent1: The intercollegiate basketball tournament brought together teams from different colleges.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed participating in intercollegiate sports events.
meanings.sent3: The intercollegiate dance-off was a fun way to showcase school spirit.
meanings.sent4: His intercollegiate rivalry with the neighboring college was legendary.
meanings.sent5: The intercollegiate academic quiz bowl tested students' knowledge across colleges.
